product_name: Fritschi Diamir Eagle 12 Randonee Bindings with Brakes
long_description: Soar down the slopes and hike back up for another run with the Fritschi Diamir Eagle 12 randonee bindings. Pivot points on the Fritschi Diamir Eagle 12 bindings are located 23mm behind the toes of the boots, resulting in a more natural stride when skinning up hills. Diamir Gliding Technology features moving baseplates that allow you to raise your feet until they are perpendicular to the skis for complete freedom of movement. Front hinge and rear heel support platforms are wider than previous versions of Fritschi bindings, offering improved stability. Quickly transition between touring mode and ski mode by adjusting the rear levers; levers also serve as 4-position heel lifts to make climbing hills more comfortable. Independent toe and heel release provide reliable exits from the bindings when falling; bindings fit DIN-standard alpine or lug-soled randonee boots. DIN setting adjusts from 4 - 12 to withstand aggressive skiing. Bindings come with 95mm-wide ski brakes installed. Mounting pattern requires skis that are 67mm or wider at the waist.
short_description: Soar down the slopes and hike back up for another run with the Fritschi Diamir Eagle 12 randonee bindings.
